profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.7 Stream objects - 6.1.7.1 General - Keywords spacing
profile.description: The stream keyword shall be followed either by a CARRIAGE RETURN (0Dh) and LINE FEED (0Ah) character sequence or by a single LINE FEED (0Ah) character. The endstream keyword shall be preceded by an EOL marker.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
